trans-unit.source: Provides data for a PropertyChanged event, which you must create.
> [!CAUTION] > Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The name of the property that changed.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs>.
The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs> in an unusable state.

After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs> so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs> was occupying.
For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs>.

Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs> object.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the parameter set to `false`.
When the Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertyChangedEventArgs> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets the name of the property that changed.
A <xref:System.String> that holds the property name.
